section.p: This template represents medications that the patient is intended to take (or stop) after discharge.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-16760, CONF:1098-16761, CONF:1098-32513 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2016-03-01"
SHALL conform to Discharge Medication template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-7691)/@code="10183-2" Hospital discharge medications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-19161, DSTU:820, CONF:1098-32159)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-32779)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-32780)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7692, CONF:1098-7693, CONF:1098-15525)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Discharge Medication template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7689, R2.0=CONF:1098-7689)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7690, R2.0=CONF:1098-7690)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-7691)/@code="10183-2" Hospital discharge medications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-19161, DSTU:820, CONF:1098-32159)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-32779)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-32780)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7692, CONF:1098-7693, CONF:1098-15525)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:16760, CONF:16761 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.35"
Consol Discharge Medication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7689, R2.0=CONF:1098-7689)
Consol Discharge Medication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7690, R2.0=CONF:1098-7690)
Consol Discharge Medication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10183-2" Discharge Medication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:7691)

Consol Discharge Medication SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7692, CONF:7693, CONF:15525) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
